title: Silent Catastrophe
description: In 1948, ambitious British journalist and author, Benedict Arthur, arrived in Palestine, eager to explore and write a book. He finds a peaceful Palestinian village, where he is welcomed by the locals. Later, as he experiences the Nakba, Benedict understands how the horrors the Palestinians went through and how their horrors were silenced. He works to write a book to provide a platform for the Palestinians people.
author: Nour Omara
